NG0449:2: san d+hi ma ha tsit+ta sa ma d+hi u pa de sha tan tra /
NG0449:4: rdzogs pa chen po snying khrid man ngag gi rgyud //
NG0449:5: med bcom stong ldan yod 'das 'gyur ba med pa'i ngang la phyag 'tshal lo //
NG0449:6: 'di skad ba dag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na //
NG0449:7: chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang *//
NG0449:8: mtha' dang dbus med pa'i gzhal yas khang na //
NG0449:9: stong pa kun tu bzang po la /
NG0449:10: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' zhus pa /
NG0449:11: kye ston pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang po lags //
NG0449:12: rang bzhin gnas lugs ji ltar lags //
NG0449:14: ston pa kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa //
NG0449:15: gzhi nas ma bcos ma bslad pa //
NG0449:16: nges phyir nges par phyag btsal nas //
NG0449:17: 'khor ba 'jug ldog gdams ngag bshad par bya //
NG0449:18: gzhi nas ma bcos ma bcings par grol //
NG0449:19: gzhi gnas grol dang 'khrul tshul dang *//
NG0449:20: de yi gdams ngag bdag gis dgrol //
NG0449:21: rang bzhin dag pas rgya ma chad //
NG0449:22: bag chags ma bsags lus ma blangs //
NG0449:23: rtogs ldan mkhas pas ma bzhag ste //
NG0449:24: g.yo ba med pa'i rang bzhin gyis //
NG0449:25: gzhi nas 'dul tshul gnyis yin te //
NG0449:26: gzhan dgag rang gzhung sgrub tshul gnyis //
NG0449:27: gzhi ma grub dang ma grub dang *//
NG0449:28: ngo bo gcig la tshul gyi tha dad dam //
NG0449:29: gnyis ka'i rang bzhin dor ba nyid du bstan //
NG0449:30: rang gzhung grub pa'i gzhi dag ni //
NG0449:31: rgya zhes mnan dang bre kha bcad //
NG0449:32: dpe yis nges par mtshon pa yin //
NG0449:34: rgya ma chad de phyogs ma lhung *//
NG0449:35: mthar ma red de 'gyur ba med //
NG0449:36: rang bzhin nam mkha' dag pa ltar //
NG0449:37: sangs rgyas sems can mnyam par gnas //
NG0449:39: yang rdo rje sems dpas zhus pa //
NG0449:41: kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa //
NG0449:42: lhan cig skyes dang kun tu btags //
NG0449:44: g.yo ba med las yid tsam g.yos //
NG0449:48: gcod pa'i lus dang dngos pa'i lus //
NG0449:49: sha khrag 'khrul pa'i lus su byung *//
NG0449:51: 'degs pa yid kyi rlung dag ni //
NG0449:52: g.yo ba med las yid tsam g.yos //
NG0449:54: gcod pa yid kyi lus dag ni //
NG0449:55: kun tu tshol ba'i yid dag dang *//
NG0449:56: gtan la phebs pa'i yid dag ni //
NG0449:57: nges par 'jog pa'i yid dang gsum //
NG0449:60: yul ni ci yin dag tu 'dug / shes pa ci yin dag tu skyes //
NG0449:61: shes pa ci yin de dag la //
NG0449:62: yul ni ci yin dag gi bsgribs //
NG0449:63: phra ba dag gi 'dzin pa skyes //
NG0449:64: kun tu tshol ba'i yid ces bya //
NG0449:65: yul ni yid med dag tu 'dug / shes pa yin min dag tu skyes //
NG0449:66: yul ni yin min gnyis kyis bsgribs //
NG0449:67: gtan la 'bebs pa'i yid ces bya //
NG0449:68: yul ni yin nges dag tu 'dug / shes pa yin nges de dag la //
NG0449:69: yul ni yin ngas dag gis sgribs //
NG0449:70: nges pa 'jog pa'i yid ces bya //
NG0449:71: 'khrul pa shin tu rags par bskyed //
NG0449:72: 'khrul pa bag chags lus dag ste //
NG0449:73: de dag ye grol yin mod kyang *//
NG0449:74: gzhi la zhen par byas te bzhag / de las 'khrul pa sha khrag lus //
NG0449:76: lha dang dmyal ba yi dwags dang *//
NG0449:77: byol song mi dang lha min drug / rtag tu 'khor bar gnas pa yin //
NG0449:78: so so skye bo mi shes pa //
NG0449:79: thos pa gsum po spangs pa'i phyir //
NG0449:80: sku gsum las ni rang du 'gyur //
NG0449:81: skye bo zhen rtog thug med rtsol //
NG0449:82: gang 'thad zhen med gdams ngag bstan //
NG0449:83: mu stegs mtha' 'dzin bcings pa la //
NG0449:84: mtha' med pa'i gdams ngag bstan //
NG0449:85: nyan thos gzung 'dzin dag gis bcings //
NG0449:86: gnyis med pa yi gdams ngag bstan //
NG0449:88: 'dzin pa gcod pa'i gdams ngag bstan //
NG0449:89: sems tsam dngos po'i 'dzin pas bcings //
NG0449:90: dbyings su bab pa'i gdams ngag bstan //
NG0449:91: dbu ma bden pa re 'jog pas //
NG0449:92: dbyer med zung 'jug gdams ngag bstan //
NG0449:93: kri ya dag pa'i chos nyid kyis //
NG0449:94: rang nyid bcings nas gnas pa la //
NG0449:95: gzhi cig pa yis gdams ngag bstan //
NG0449:96: u pa ya ni tha dad pa //
NG0449:97: lta spyod ya gal bdud kyis bcings //
NG0449:98: lta spyod zung 'brel gdams ngag bstan //
NG0449:99: yo ga byin brlabs cho 'phrul gyis //
NG0449:100: rang nyid bcings nas gnas pa la //
NG0449:101: rang nyid byin brlabs ngo bo la //
NG0449:102: rang la yod pa'i dngos grub bstan //
NG0449:103: ma ha ting 'dzin rim pas 'jug / gong 'og rtsol bas bcings pa la //
NG0449:104: bzang ngan med pa'i gdams ngag bstan //
NG0449:105: a nu skad cig lhar gsal rtsol //
NG0449:106: rig pa rten med yul med bstan //
NG0449:107: gnas skabs gdams ngag grang thad la //
NG0449:108: gzer lnga lnga yi gdams ngag bstan //
NG0449:109: rgya zho mnan dang bre kha bcad //
NG0449:110: rgya ma chad de phyogs ma lhung *//
NG0449:111: 'gro drug snang ba rang gi sems //
NG0449:112: rang sems sangs rgyas yin par bshad //
NG0449:113: grol mthar 'khor ldog bstan pa la //
NG0449:114: rang bzhin gnas dang ting 'dzin dang *//
NG0449:115: rmi lam skye shi'i bar do dang *//
NG0449:116: srid pa bar do thog mtha' bcad //
NG0449:117: gnas pa'i bar do'i mtshan nyid ni //
NG0449:118: ngo bo 'gyur med stong pa ste //
NG0449:119: rang rgyud 'dzin pa'i zhen pa grol //
NG0449:120: rgyu dang rkyen gyis ma bskyed pa //
NG0449:121: rang byung bas na rag ma lus //
NG0449:124: gzhan la skyes nas rten yod min //
NG0449:125: rang snang ris med ye shes kyis //
NG0449:126: stong pa skur 'debs zhen las grol //
NG0449:127: phyi rol yul gyi snang ba dang *//
NG0449:128: rnam rtog blo yi snang ba dang *//
NG0449:129: ye shes rang snang 'dzin med gsum //
NG0449:130: dbyer med bde chen zung 'jug go / bden brdzun res 'jog zhen pa grol //
NG0449:131: dus la snga phyi med pa dang *//
NG0449:132: 'dug sa tha dad med pa dang *//
NG0449:133: ngo bo bzang ngan med pa yis //
NG0449:134: gnyis med dag tu ngo sprod do //
NG0449:135: de ltar 'dug tshul gol ba ni //
NG0449:136: yon tan rnam gzhi rang la 'byung *//
NG0449:138: ting 'dzin bar do lnga zhen bcad //
NG0449:139: phyin ci ma log par ma chad //
NG0449:140: yun rings dag tu gnas pa ni //
NG0449:141: sngar zhen bag chags bcad pa de //
NG0449:142: gdams ngag dag gis gzer chen yin //
NG0449:143: rgod pa ma yin bying ba med //
NG0449:144: re pha ma yin dogs ma yin //
NG0449:145: rtag pa ma yin chad pa min //
NG0449:146: 'jams pa ma yin the tshom med //
NG0449:148: shes pa re mtshor shor ba dang *//
NG0449:149: shes pa nyid 'brur shor ba dang *//
NG0449:150: sngar zhen ma yin 'khrul rtog med //
NG0449:151: byung tshor ma yin bying rmug med //
NG0449:152: rig pa yul du mi byed cing *//
NG0449:153: ting 'dzin ro la mi chags na //
NG0449:154: mi rtog rang ngo yin par bshad //
NG0449:155: bar ma chad du yun rings su //
NG0449:156: rtag tu rten med gnas par bya //
NG0449:157: byung na rig pa rjes med gang *//
NG0449:158: mi 'gegs mi sgrub rtsol ba med //
NG0449:159: gnad kyi gdams ngag yin par bshad //
NG0449:160: rmi lam bar do gcig tu bsre //
NG0449:161: gdams ngag gis ni bsre ba dang *//
NG0449:162: spyod lam khams kyi tshod dang sbyar //
NG0449:164: gnyen po stobs su 'gyur ba dang *//
NG0449:165: bag chags dag la mi gnas na //
NG0449:166: gnyid kyi gdams ngag 'byongs pa yin //
NG0449:167: ye shes gcig tu 'dres pa ste //
NG0449:168: de la bdud kyi tshugs ma yin //
NG0449:170: goms par gyur pa dag yin na //
NG0449:171: rkyen gzhan dag kyang dgos mi srid //
NG0449:172: ma sgoms brtan par ma gyur na //
NG0449:174: gsal btang rkyen gyis sngar sor tshud //
NG0449:175: rig pa zang thal skyon ma gos //
NG0449:176: sngar zhen bag chags chod pa dang *//
NG0449:177: blo bur 'khrul rtog chod pa yi //
NG0449:178: ye shes skyon med rang grol lo //
NG0449:179: phung po shes pa dag dang bral //
NG0449:180: dper na mun khung sgron med ltar //
NG0449:181: ye shes phyogs 'dzin rtog pa bral //
NG0449:182: thams cad mkhyen pa'i sangs rgyas ni //
NG0449:183: rang du mi rtog gzhan mi rtog / mi rtog chos skur gnas pa'o //
NG0449:184: sku gsum ston pa'i sangs rgyas kyang *//
NG0449:185: byin brlabs ngo bo tshig bsdebs nas //
NG0449:186: gang dang gang gis 'dul ba la //
NG0449:187: gang dang gang 'thad ston pa ni //
NG0449:188: gzhan don longs sku sprul sku yin //
NG0449:189: shes pas bsgribs pa gcod pa dang *//
NG0449:190: rnam par snang mdzad long sku yis //
NG0449:191: sgra dang tshig tu ma bsdebs te //
NG0449:192: rang gi ngo bos bstan pa'o //
NG0449:195: gang la gang 'thad gdams ngag ston //
NG0449:196: lha skad klu skad gnod sbyin skad //
NG0449:197: grul bum skad dang mi yi skad rnams dang *//
NG0449:198: 'gro ba kun gyi skad rnams ji tsam par //
NG0449:199: thams cad skad du bdag gi chos //
NG0449:200: tshig dang yi ger sdebs nas ston //
NG0449:201: lha rnams 'dun pa bskyed pa'i phyir //
NG0449:202: pi wang chen po rab tu bsnams //
NG0449:203: 'thab rtsod sdug bsngal zhi ba'i phyir //
NG0449:204: mtshon cha go cha rab tu bsnams //
NG0449:205: mi rnams dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir //
NG0449:206: dge slong gseg shang par bu bsnams //
NG0449:207: ma rig mun pa bsal ba'i phyir //
NG0449:208: chos kyi po ti rab tu ba snams //
NG0449:209: bkres skom sdug bsngal zhi bya'i phyir //
NG0449:210: rin chen sgrom bu phyag na bsnams //
NG0449:211: tsha grang sdug bsngal zhi bya'i phyir //
NG0449:212: me chu'i bsil dro phyag na bsnams //
NG0449:213: gang 'thad theg pa de la bstan //
NG0449:214: rdzogs pa chen po snying khrid man ngag gi rgyud //
